body: Its the only futanari I can actually enjoy: on one hand the comedy is great, on the other the girls are drawn so perfectly I just have to imagine they have no dicks.
@ConnerLikesCake what the fuck is the point of giving a girl a dick if she's just gonna have straight sex with a guy anyway. Male on dickgirl is boring as fuck
i love big tits, white skin, dark skin, big areolae, futa, big dicks, big balls, masturbation, and teasing. this manga is perfect for me
This futa porn this creator has been making would be good if there were guys fucking them. I dont see the point of giving women cocks and not getting fucked by dudes still.
No, no, no, no, let me explain: Futas are not gay, therefore seeing their dicks and getting off by them are totally okay

@PizzaSalami It's not exactly gay, but I get where you're coming from. I feel mostly the same. I am getting tired of all this nudity and emphasis of penises. We get it, it's been established from Ch1 they're elf girls with big dicks (mostly). How about we see some actual action aside from them jerking off and "fantasy" almost sex that never happens or interrupted by anything? Really starting to doubt the intentions of this artist now..

I don't like this anymore. It started out well, but the fact that they never fucked was frustrating enough. Now, what with the recent panels looking like another manga entirely, I stopped reading: no story at all, pointlessly pompous art and colour style, excessive sizes and focus on penises. Can't speak for everybody, but I do like futa paired with girls or other futa: I don't exactly enjoy looking at half a page of frozen-still big dicks, it's almost become a gay manga (nothing bad per se but it's not what most of us wanted out of this).

just give yuri big dick growth with unlimited libido then fucks thicc futa elves = heaven. 
wasted thicc elves really lol
Fuaark I want to see Yuri getting fucked. I'm starting to think the author is low-key gae and just want to draw a big horse dick
Woah damn, there's so much that can happen
This masterpiece has both potential to be the best ecchi yuri manga and best futa hentai
I still wait that one day this piece of work will turn into the greatest futa hentai in the world, cause the art is already top tier
Man, I really wish he'd get them to fuck already. This has the potential to be best futanari work ever, but he holds it back.
